data.name: Adventure Field™ 3 Shiny Charm
data.detailed_description:
This DLC give the player :


  • The Shiny Charm in-game one time on every save file and new game...
  • It should unlock it self just after the menu and items tutorial...

The Shiny Charm is an item that you carry with a passive effect
that boost the spawn rate of rare colored shiny monster by 500%...

The DLC content don't need any special configuration...
